text: Aanei la nia mee ala e helekai ai Tagi go Yihowah, “Digau Philistia guu hai di nadau huaidu e tala di hui haga huaidu ang gi nadau hagadaumee mai hua i mua, ga daaligi digaula i lodo di nadau hagadugina ginaadou.25.15 Isaiah 14.29-31; Jeremiah 47.1-7; Joel 3.4-8; Amos 1.6-8; Zephaniah 2.4-7; Zechariah 9.5-7
